languages.text: {n}На виске Иокасты вздувается вена.{/n} "Да что уж, давайте сразу ему и дворец с садами на шпилях Даргонуса пожалуем. Лорд-капитан, я сомневаюсь, что вы так добьетесь желаемого результата... Но сделаем все, что в наших силах".

{n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."
languages.original_text: {n}На виске Иокасты вздувается вена.{/n} "Да что уж, давайте сразу ему и дворец с садами на шпилях Даргонуса пожалуем. Лорд-капитан, я сомневаюсь, что вы так добьетесь желаемого результата... Но сделаем все, что в наших силах".

traits.locale_text: {n}A vein swells on Jocasta's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the desired result. But we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Jocasta's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the desired result. But we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Jocasta's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Jocasta's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

{n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

languages.text: {n}An Sauerbacks Schläfe schwillt eine Ader an.{/n} "Sollen wir ihn auch gleich in einen Freudenpalast auf Dargonus schicken, wo wir schon dabei sind? Lord Captain, ich bezweifle, dass Ihr das gewünschte Ergebnis erzielt, aber wir werden alles in unserer Macht stehende tun."
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

traits.locale_text: {n}An Sauerbacks Schläfe schwillt eine Ader an.{/n} "Sollen wir ihn auch gleich in einen Freudenpalast auf Dargonus schicken, wo wir schon dabei sind? Lord Captain, ich bezweifle, dass Ihr das gewünschte Ergebnis erzielt, aber wir werden alles in unserer Macht stehende tun."

languages.text: {n}Une veine gonfle sur la tempe de Sauerback.{/n} « Et pourquoi ne pas lui offrir un palais dans les tours de Dargonus, tant qu'on y est ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je doute que vous obteniez le résultat souhaité, mais nous ferons tout ce qui est en notre pouvoir pour y parvenir. »
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une veine gonfle sur la tempe de Sauerback.{/n} « Et pourquoi ne pas lui offrir un palais dans les tours de Dargonus, tant qu'on y est ? {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, je doute que vous obteniez le résultat souhaité, mais nous ferons tout ce qui est en notre pouvoir pour y parvenir. »

languages.text: {n}Ves hincharse una vena en la sien de Sauerback.{/n} «Y ya que estamos, ¿por qué no lo llevamos a un balneario de las torres de Dargonus? Lord Capitán, dudo que así consiga el resultado que pretende, pero haremos cuanto esté en nuestro poder».
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves hincharse una vena en la sien de Sauerback.{/n} «Y ya que estamos, ¿por qué no lo llevamos a un balneario de las torres de Dargonus? Lord Capitán, dudo que así consiga el resultado que pretende, pero haremos cuanto esté en nuestro poder».

languages.text: {n}ザウアーバックのこめかみに血管が浮き上がる。{/n}「その間、ダルゴナスの尖塔にある快楽の宮殿も与えてやりましょうか？ロード・キャプテン、お望みの結果が得られるとは思えませんが、力の及ぶ限りで全力を尽くしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

traits.locale_text: {n}ザウアーバックのこめかみに血管が浮き上がる。{/n}「その間、ダルゴナスの尖塔にある快楽の宮殿も与えてやりましょうか？ロード・キャプテン、お望みの結果が得られるとは思えませんが、力の及ぶ限りで全力を尽くしましょう」

languages.text: {n}苏尔贝克太阳穴上的血管鼓了起来。{/n}“不如趁这个机会，在达戈努斯的尖塔上为他置办一座享乐用的宫殿吧？您的做法未必能让您得到想要的东西，舰长大人，不过我们会竭尽所能。”
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."

traits.locale_text: {n}苏尔贝克太阳穴上的血管鼓了起来。{/n}“不如趁这个机会，在达戈努斯的尖塔上为他置办一座享乐用的宫殿吧？您的做法未必能让您得到想要的东西，舰长大人，不过我们会竭尽所能。”

languages.text: {n}Sauerback'in şakağındaki damarları çıkıyor.{/n} "Hazır başlamışken ona Dargonus kulelerindeki zevk sarayında da yer ayırtalım mı? Lord Kaptan, istediğiniz sonuçlara ulaşacağınızdan kuşkuluyum. Yine de elimizden gelen her şeyi yapacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}A vein swells on Sauerback's temple.{/n} "Should we also grant him a pleasure palace in the spires of Dargonus while we are at it? Lord Captain, I doubt you will get the result you desire, but we will do everything within our power."
